channel.title: Sustainability on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Sustainability on FinanClub

item.title: UNVR
item.description: score:1087 Chances: Univar Solutions has completed an acquisition by Apollo Funds, maintaining its global presence under the Univar Solutions name and brand. The company has expanded its distribution relationship with Kalsec Inc. for hop ingredients in the United States, enhancing its specialty ingredient offerings.

item.title: CX
item.description: score:1041 Chances: Cemex and Synhelion’s joint effort to develop fully solar-driven cement production represents a significant milestone, potentially revolutionizing the energy-intensive cement manufacturing process. Double-digit price hikes and a strong peso have contributed to Cemex’s rise in net profit and revenue in the second quarter, demonstrating positive financial performance.

item.title: GRAB
item.description: score:1102 Chances: Grab Holdings’ upcoming announcement of its unaudited second quarter 2023 results and conference call could provide insights into the company’s financial performance and strategic outlook. Strategic reorganization and job cuts by Grab Holdings aim to manage costs, achieve affordability, and adapt to the evolving business environment.
